result.markdown: --- title: "Welcome to my blog" description: "My story about this blog" author: "Jewel Johnson" date: "05/20/2022" format: html: toc: false toc-title: On this page html-math-method: katex number-sections: false smooth-scroll: true highlight-style: github code-link: true citation: true execute: warning: false freeze: auto image: "happy.jpeg" categories: [news] --- ![Cover photo of my old blog made using {distill}](logo.png) ## Making of one-carat-blog (second version) Hello! my name is Jewel Johnson and I am the creator of this blog. The main reason why I made this blog was to have a source of medium for me to write articles in science and share them with the world. This first version of this blog was made using the `{distill}` package in R and you can find the link to it [here](https://jeweljohnsonj.github.io/jeweljohnson.github.io/). From then I moved on and remade the blog using the latest `{quarto}` package in R. This new package proves to be an upgrade from `{distill}` and I am starting to love the new features of it. Since I am also fond of using R, I took it upon me to write a few tutorials focusing on beginners, which you can find in this blog. Update (26-May-2022): I have also written a few articles on basic statistics and how to do them in R. ## How did I make this blog There are several well-explained tutorials which explain from scratch how one can build a blog. If you are planning to use `{quarto}` for making your blog, then the quarto website itself features well written beginner friendly tutorials. Apart from that I found two other posts which also proved very useful while creating this blog. The links are given below. - [Quarto website](https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/) - [Porting from distill to quarto](https://blog.djnavarro.net/posts/2022-04-20_porting-to-quarto/) - [We don't talk about Quarto](https://www.apreshill.com/blog/2022-04-we-dont-talk-about-quarto/) #### Last updated on {.unnumbered .unlisted} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2022-05-26 13:32:24 IST" ``` ::: :::
